Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TestAsyncTableAdminApi

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.AbstractTestUpdateConfiguration
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAsyncAdminBase
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAsyncTableAdminApi
public class TestAsyncTableAdminApi extends TestAsyncAdminBase
Class to test asynchronous table admin operations.
See Also:
  • This test and it used to be joined it was taking longer than our ten minute timeout so they were split.
  • Another split out from this class so each runs under ten minutes.
